translations: 同事；合作人（coworker 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Unlike in friendships, you need coworkers.
sentences.translation: 与友谊不同的是，你需要同事。

sentences.sentence: I have a Star Wars lunchbox, and my coworkers are all jealous!
sentences.translation: 我有一个星球大战的饭盒，我的同事都羡慕极了！

sentences.sentence: Those are all valid, but you need to take time to hear out your coworkers, too.
sentences.translation: 这些都是有道理的，但你也需要花时间听听同事们的意见。
